section.title: Adding Amazon EC2 Providers
section.para: After initial installation and creation of a CloudForms Management Engine environment, add an Amazon EC2 cloud provider by following this procedure:

step.para:
Click
(Configuration), then click
(Add a New Cloud Provider).
Enter a Name for the provider.
From the Type drop down menu select Amazon EC2.
Select the appropriate Zone if you have more than one available.
Generate an Access Key in the Security Credentials of your Amazon AWS account. The Access Key ID acts as your User ID, and your Secret Access Key acts as your Password.
Click Validate to validate the credentials.
